keywords.trans: บูสต์ระบบประสาท
keywords.desc: Neural Upgrade Augmenter is a cutting-edge implant that enables users to break past their mental limitations and reach untold levels of cognitive enhancement. With the ability to exceed typical neural barriers, users can unlock new levels of insight, creativity, and physical performance.

keywords.trans: ตัวเสริมไซเบอร์
keywords.desc: An item name, a cybernetic implant that can enhance players' abilities

keywords.trans: ยูโรดอล
keywords.desc: EuroDollar is a widely accepted currency in the continent, used for everyday purchases and transactions.

keywords.trans: ไซเบอร์บาท
keywords.desc: NetCoin is a digital currency mainly used in black market transactions. It is untraceable and can be used to purchase illegal goods and services.

keywords.desc: A fictional currency name in the game, translate to a suitable name in your language

keywords.trans: ปลาไซเบอร์

keywords.trans: นิวโรบล็อกเกอร์

keywords.desc: A generic word for 'continue' in UI

keywords.trans: ตัดวงจร
keywords.desc: a megacorporation that specializes in security-related tasks, they also has a hitman service where people can place hit on their enemies

keywords.trans: พวก
keywords.desc: A slang word for friend/bro in cyberpunk term

keywords.trans: ตู้คอนเทนเนอร์ลับๆ
keywords.desc: A uncommon container that contains a random item.

keywords.trans: พลังไซเบอร์เนติก
ไซเบอร์คลั่ง

keywords.trans: ไซเบอร์จิตหลอน
keywords.desc: A mental illness caused by excessive cybernetic implants

keywords.trans: ไซเบอร์
keywords.desc: A term used to describe cybernetic implants

keywords.trans: ดาต้าคอร์
keywords.desc: Encrypted intelligence data recovered from corporate raids. Highly valuable to information brokers.

keywords.trans: เวล
keywords.desc: One of the npc's name in the game, does not need to be direct translation from english

keywords.trans: สัญญาปัญญา
keywords.desc: A contract that provides challenging objectives with substantial rewards, reset every week based on Arclight City's dynamic geopolitical situation, offering fresh scenarios and story-driven content each time.

keywords.trans: แผนกข่าวลือ
keywords.desc: A division of the corporate that handles intelligence gathering and corporate espionage activities

keywords.trans: ชิพเครดิตขาย
keywords.desc:
A special credit chip that provides discounts on sale items. Expires in ${days} days.
This can be traded with Pachinko Guy

keywords.trans: ชายคนซูเปอร์บอล
keywords.desc: One of the npc's name in the game, does not need to be direct translation from english

keywords.trans: ข่าวแอคลายต์
keywords.desc: The name of the news channel in the game

keywords.trans: กุญแจกระเป๋า Stronghold
keywords.desc: A key found within the dungeon that opens locked chests. Cannot be taken out of the stronghold.

keywords.trans: ใบอนุญาตเข้าถึงการสืบสวน
keywords.desc: ACPD investigation system access authorization. Required to submit case verdicts. Consumed upon submission regardless of outcome.

keywords.trans: เมก้าเอสเตท
keywords.desc: A notoriously greedy housing agency known for predatory practices and exploiting citizens in the hyper-inflated real estate market

keywords.trans: SHINKAI Exchange Group
keywords.desc: Arclight City's primary stock exchange, facilitating trading of corporate shares and derivatives

keywords.trans: ไบโอซิน อินดัสตรีส์
keywords.desc: A leading biotechnology and pharmaceutical corporation focused on genetic engineering, synthetic biology, and advanced bioware implants

keywords.trans: ชิ๊ป
keywords.desc: The city's dominant social media platform, connecting millions through short-form posts and real-time information sharing

keywords.trans: Ouroboros Dynamics
keywords.desc: A controversial AI and consciousness transfer corporation specializing in recursive neural networks, synthetic companions, and digital immortality services

keywords.trans: Arc Energy Holdings
keywords.desc: The city's energy infrastructure monopoly, controlling the power grid, water treatment, and waste management systems

keywords.trans: คริสตจักรแห่งพาชินโก
keywords.desc: A fanatical cult worshipping the "Goddess of Pachinko" who interpret gambling losses as tests of faith

keywords.trans: ศาสนาซิงกูลาริตี้
keywords.desc: Believers in the inevitable emergence of a god-like superintelligent AI, actively working to accelerate this event through AI development

keywords.trans: ACPD
keywords.desc: Arclight City Police Department - A largely corrupt and brutally violent police force, often influenced or directly controlled by mega-corporations

keywords.trans: ตำรวจนครราตรี
keywords.desc: The city's police force, known for corruption and outsourcing law enforcement through public bounties

keywords.trans: ตลาดมืด
keywords.desc: A decentralized underground network where mercenaries trade loots and illegal items using NetCoins, run by the enigmatic Ren

keywords.trans: ฟิกเซอร์
keywords.desc: Professional intermediaries who connect mercenaries with each other and broker crew formations for dangerous gigs

keywords.trans: แก๊งถนน
keywords.desc: Numerous gangs that control territory in the lower districts and slums, often specializing in specific criminal enterprises

keywords.trans: เทคโนแมนเซอร์
keywords.desc: A mysterious, anonymous, and decentralized collective of elite hackers (Netrunners) known for sophisticated cyberattacks against corrupt mega-corporations

keywords.trans: ไซเบอร์แวร์
keywords.desc: Body modifications that are ubiquitous in Arclight City, ranging from functional enhancements to purely aesthetic statements

keywords.trans: ผู้รับจ้าง
keywords.desc: Common freelance operatives hired by corporations, gangs, or individuals for tasks ranging from security to espionage and wetwork

keywords.trans: จ้างมือ
keywords.desc: Short form of mercenary, common freelance operatives in Arclight City

keywords.trans: งาน
keywords.desc: A job or mission, typically for a mercenary

keywords.trans: ออฟฟิศแมน
keywords.desc: Corporate employee or related to corporations, often used derisively

keywords.trans: โง่
keywords.desc: Idiot, fool - cyberpunk slang

keywords.trans: พรีเมียม
keywords.desc: Premium, top-quality, excellent - cyberpunk slang

keywords.trans: ครอม
keywords.desc: Cyberware, or generally, anything high-tech and shiny - cyberpunk slang

keywords.trans: ตาย
keywords.desc: Killed - cyberpunk slang

keywords.trans: สาธารณรัฐแคลิฟอร์เนียใหม่
keywords.desc: A powerful, semi-autonomous state within the American Federation that covers much of the former US West Coast

keywords.trans: NRC
keywords.desc: Abbreviation for New Republic of California

keywords.trans: สหพันธรัฐอเมริกา
keywords.desc: The volatile and fractured successor to the former United States, an unstable patchwork of bickering states and corporate-run zones

keywords.trans: สหพันธ์อเมริกัน
keywords.desc: Abbreviation for American Federation

keywords.trans: พันธมิตรทวีปตะวันออก
keywords.desc: A strategic alliance between the mainland continental power and Russia, engaged in tense cold war with the American Federation

keywords.trans: ECA
keywords.desc: Abbreviation for Eastern Continental Alliance

keywords.trans: สหกรณ์แพนเอเชีย
keywords.desc: A vast, technologically dominant economic bloc stretching across much of East Asia and Oceania

keywords.trans: PAC
keywords.desc: Abbreviation for Pan-Asian Cooperative

keywords.trans: สหพันธ์ยุโรป
keywords.desc: Controlling most of Western and Central Europe, a heavily fortified and bureaucratic super-state focused on internal stability and defense

keywords.trans: EF
keywords.desc: Abbreviation for European Federation

keywords.trans: คอนซอร์ทีอัมอ่าวเปอร์เซีย
keywords.desc: A coalition led by Iran including several Middle Eastern nations that survived The Collapse by leveraging their energy resources

keywords.trans: PGC
keywords.desc: Abbreviation for Persian Gulf Consortium

keywords.trans: สาธารณรัฐเทคโนโลยีอิสราเอล
keywords.desc: A techno-corporate state that leveraged technological expertise to become a major player in cybersecurity, AI development, and military technology

keywords.trans: ITR
keywords.desc: Abbreviation for Israeli Tech Republic

keywords.trans: แจ็ค แจ็กสัน
keywords.desc: A tenacious investigative journalist for Arclight Times, known for his deeply researched exposés with the catchphrase: "The data doesn't lie, people do."

keywords.trans: อานยา เปโทรฟา
keywords.desc: A precise, objective data journalist for Arclight Times who specializes in data-driven analysis and quantitative reporting

keywords.trans: ไค ตานากะ
keywords.desc: An immersive, narrative-driven journalist for Arclight Times who focuses on street-level stories from the Lower Districts, known for: "Every augment tells a story..."

keywords.trans: ซาร่า คาน
keywords.desc: A high-level strategic reporter for Arclight Times with a background in global threat analysis, focusing on geopolitical and corporate power dynamics
